Machine learning models are often represented as scalar functions 
$$f:\mathcal{S}\mapsto\mathbb{R}$$ 
from set of _possible worlds_ $a$ to reals $R$
$$a = \frac{1}{2}$$ AS

### Atomic Worlds
The simplest type of possible worlds.

val words = List("eat","house")
val labels = List("Verb","Noun")
case class Token(word:String, label:String)
all(Token) { words x labels }
